duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform environmental assessments, remedial investigations, site inspections, and sampling for various activities/media such as Groundwater, Soil, Sediment, Surface Water, Pore Water, and Air.
Assist in conducting pilot tests and decommissioning of groundwater pump and treat and soil vapor extraction equipment.
Perform operation and maintenance on a variety of remedial systems and work in a team setting with project managers and other team personnel.

education_certification.credential: OSHA 40 hr. HAZWOPER Certification including current refresher training Physical/Chemical Wastewater Operator License #D (South Carolina) Valid driver's license
